put.description: Update profile by user ID. Only `MASTER` and `MANAGER` are allowed to update profiles.

get.description: Get active users with emails and birthdays for `MASTER` and `MANAGER`. Otherwise, emails and birthdays are hidden
Get user by ID. For `MASTER` and `MANAGER` emails and birthdays are given. They can also access resigned users. For `ACCOUNTANT` and `CAMP`, emails and birthdays are hidden.

put.description: Update user by ID. Only `MASTER` and `MANAGER` are allowed to update users.

requestBody.description: User object that needs to be updated

post.description: Send a reset link to the given user.

message.example: We have emailed your password reset link!
